1.5.name: wordpress/audibase
1.5.description:
Instantly Record and Upload to the Cloud…

Record, Upload, Email, Share, Comment and Collaborate your Audio. Audibase allows you to take your audio whether recorded via our Recording App and directly uploaded or uploaded from your computer and easily share it online with our selection of stylish embed players. Using our embed code or our Wordpress Plugin easily add audio to your wordpress blog or website. Great for Sermons, Interviews, Bands, Artists, Life Coaching, Workshops, Meetings, Lectures, Mixtapes, Audio Emails.

Mobile App Integration Demo Below no Dictaphone needed.

Audibase is great way to get your audio heard we also give you the option to sell you audio online using third party services.

with our nice minimalistic player your audio can sit nicely within you blog and blend in with your ch
